channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- M-Files Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- M-Files Client

item.title: CVE-2022-4861|2024-08-28T10:35:13.939Z -- m-files -- m-files%20client
item.description: Incorrect implementation in authentication protocol in M-Files Client before 22.5.11356.0 allows high privileged user to get other users tokens to another resource.

item.title: CVE-2023-2480|2024-08-28T08:26:30.978Z -- m-files -- m-files%20client
item.description: Missing access permissions checks in M-Files Client before 23.5.12598.0 (excluding 23.2 SR2 and newer) allows elevation of privilege via UI extension applications
